# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=If enabled and authentication fails, no further authentication service will be tried.
onlyAuthService = 0

# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Use passwords generated by this extension only.
forceSalted = 1

# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Update FE/BE user passwords to salted hash ones during authentication. (will not work when forceSalted is activated)
updatePasswd = 1

# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Use Blowfish Encryption instead of MD5 Hashing for building the Salted Hashes
useBlowFish = 0

# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Try to recognize passwords in old t3sec_saltedpws style (WARRNING: Extension hast to be in filesystem)
handleOldFormat = 0



TSConstantEditor.basic {
  description = <span style="background:red; padding:1px 2px; color:#fff; font-weight:bold;">1</span> Due to a bug in sysext:setup (<a href="http://bugs.typo3.org/view.php?id=9888" style="text-decoration:underline;">hardcoded md5 hashing</a>), enabling this setting will prevent reuse of a changed BE user password done with setup module.<br />Either disable forcePHPasswd setting or change password of a BE user by record modification only (e.g. in list module)!
  1=forceSalted
}
